name: LudumDare46-ZenGarden
description:
# Zen Garden

# Description

You are gardening peacefully when hoodlums starts wreaking havoc in your little sanctuary of peace.
This can only be solved in violence.

The theme was Keep it Alive. You need to grow your garden and keep it alive against dangerous people.

# Recommandations and controls

This only works on fullscreen.

WASD or arrow keys to move around. Left Click to add a garden tile (This costs money). Right Click to shoot people.

In the menu, Esc to quit and Enter to Start if you don’t want to use the mouse
